name: SuperStar BRANDNEW
description:
New Rhythm Game with BRANDNEW MUSIC!
Let SuperStar BRANDNEW Begin!

Weekly Updated Songs and Themed Cards!
- BRANDNEW MUSIC artists' songs and cards are updated!
- Play the new songs and upgrade your brand new Cards!

Various Artists and Their Greatest Hits
- Meet Verbal Jint, BUMKEY, Eluphant, HANHAE, As One, Yang Da Il, AB6IX, BDC Lee Eun Sang, KANTO, GREE, Yenjamin and Kang Min Hee tracks right now

Weekly League with Worldwide Fans
- Aim for higher place in Weekly League!
- Compete with global fans for rewards!

Various Events and Contents
- Join various weekly events/missions with artist music and Cards.
- There might be something exclusive on SuperStar BRANDNEW...?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[Application Permission Usage Notice]
We are requesting for access permissions to provide services as below.
Required Access Permissions
Camera/Storage: For saving the game data in your storage
Read, write on external storage: For saving settings and music data cache
Device ID and phone calls: For tracking and analyzing advertisement records and creating tokens for push notifications
Wi-Fi connection information: For sending guide messages upon downloading additional data
ID: For creating and confirming user accounts


[Access Permission Revoke]
Settings > SuperStar BRANDNEW > Access Agree or Access Revoke

※ Visual Setting
If you experience lags in the game you can change your visual setting to low resolution for better performance.

※ While SuperStar BRANDNEW is available for free, you will get charged upon purchases of certain paid items.

※ If you have any inquiries or require any further information, please contact us at.
E-MAIL: support.superstar.brandnew@dalcomsoft.com

SuperStar BRANDNEW Dalcomsoft Contact Information
Email: support.superstar.brandnew@dalcomsoft.com
